sn54:11.4.1_0: Yañhi taṁ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
sn54:12.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā lomasakaṁbhiyo sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
sn54:12.1.2_0: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yenāyasmā lomasakaṁbhiyo tenupasaṅkami;
sn54:12.1.2_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ lomasakaṁbhiyaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn54:12.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho mahānāmo sakko āyasmantaṁ lomasakaṁbhiyaṁ etadavoca:

sn54:16.14.3_0: samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,

sn54:16.15.1_0: So tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
sn54:16.15.2_1: bhikkhu tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti—
sn54:16.15.3_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
sn54:16.15.3_2: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
sn54:16.16.3_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati—upaṭṭhitāssa tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno sati hoti asammuṭṭhā.
sn54:16.16.5_0: satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
sn54:16.16.5_1: satisambojjhaṅgaṁ tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti—satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati …pe….
sn54:16.17.1_0: So tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
sn54:16.17.2_1: bhikkhu tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti—
sn54:16.17.3_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
sn54:16.17.3_2: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
sn54:16.17.4_1: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā evaṁ bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti.
sn54:16.18.1_1: satta bojjhaṅgā kathaṁ bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṁ paripūrenti?
sn54:16.18.2_1: bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ;
sn54:16.18.3_0: dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ …pe…
